resources.string: Please allow Location Permissions - Google requires this for your phone to scan for another phone’s Bluetooth. We also use it to keep track of the time you spend on the University of Auckland campus. Your location will not be transmitted or stored, only whether you’re within the campus area or not.
OpenTrace needs save files for logs (Debug builds only)
This device does not support BLE
Help the Safe Blues experiment by running the app on your phone.
We use Bluetooth signals to spread digital tokens between your phone and the phones of other Safe Blues users around you. This spread of tokens acts similarly to the spread of real airborne disease.
The Safe Blues experiment is a digital simulation and completely isolated. It is not related to your health status, or the health status of others in any way.
The app communicates with the Safe Blues server daily to sync anonymized simulation data.
Setting up for your family? \nUse their number instead of yours.
A 6-digit code has been sent to %s.
Select \'Yes\' or \'Allow\' for the next few screens to set up.

Android needs Location Permissions for Bluetooth to work. Additionally to give you prizes for experiment participation, we log how many hours you spend on the University of Auckland City Campus each day. No coordinates or exact timestamps are stored or collected as part of the experiment. Location and Bluetooth are always in use, even when the app is in the background. Bluetooth is used to collect research data, and your location is used to measure time spent on campus for logging campus hours.
App permissions are fully set up
Please leave all settings on until the experiment ends.
We\'ll text you a One-Time Pin (OTP)
Please try to keep the app running in the background while on campus.
Ask friends and family to help
Data has been uploaded to contact tracers
By uploading, you agree to share with OTC your OpenTrace proximity data for the past 21 days. We do not collect any geolocation or personal data.
Application needs location permission in order to work. Do you want to enable location permission?
Your consent is needed to collect and store for the following:
Anonymized Safe Blues experimental data collected through your phone
Data about your participation in the experiment for the purpose of awarding prizes
Please enter the OTP sent to your mobile phone via sms
Keep push notifications on too, so we can alert you if the app is not scanning.
An error has occurred. Please try again
Your account has been disabled. Please contact support.
Too many requests. Please try again later.
Safe Blues is active and collecting research data!
Restart phone if this notification disappears
Join me in the Safe Blues experiment! Go to: https://safeblues.org/experiment/
